text.data: [character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Hurry, this way![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! Stop![end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x1] is so fast![0xfc][0x1][end1]
[character][0x1]: Hey, [character][0x1]... Do you mind if I hold on tighter?[end]
Sure! It's kind of awkward, so don't...[end1]
But... oops! Too late...[end]
Okay... I'll hold on really tight.[end]

Hey, [character][0x1]... I wonder how far the sky goes...
Reaching beyond the sky... I wonder if there's a feeling to express that?[end]
[character][0x1]: No... don't go in...[end]

Palpaleos: I have received permission to take off from Sauzer.
Okay... Princess [character][0x1]... Let's go. My dragon is waiting outside.[end]
[character][0x1]: Just once... Several hours until night comes...[end]
[character][0x1]: Will you really fly me anywhere?[end]
Palpaleos: Anywhere you wish...[end]
Palpaleos: It might not be as good as one of Kahna's dragons.[end]
[character][0x1]: No... It's a lot faster than [character][0x1]!![end]
Palpaleos: [character][0x1]... He can really burn things...[end]
Palpaleos: Princess [character][0x1]... You don't need to hold on so tightly...[end]
Please... Stop calling me a princess...[end]
I want to fly... To the ends of the sky...[end]
Palpaleos: Is this is the place of your memories, [character][0x1]...?[end]
[character][0x1]: No... It's not a place of memories. You see... we... We've just started.[end]
Palpaleos: We've just started...[end]
[character][0x1]: There's an old legend about this church...[end]
Palpaleos: Legend...?[end]
[character][0x1]: It's a dreamy story... But... I won't make you listen to it now. Someday... just the two of us... This church... When that time comes it will become a church of memories.[end]
Palpaleos: Someday just the two of us...[end]
[character][0x1]: We don't have time now, so...[end]
Please... Freeze time just like the way it is now...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]!! Wait!![0xfc][0x1][end1]
[character][0x1]: Hey, [character][0x1]. This is called the Church of Memories. Do you know why?[end]
Why is it called that? Tell me. I know that, but I wonder why?[end1]
Dreamy, isn't it... When two people who love each other come to this church... They will always be together, forever...[end]
This church has a lovely legend. When two people who love each other come to this church... They will always be together, forever...[end]
Do you want to go in with me?[end]
Yeah, let's try going in. No way![end1]
That's right... If you married me... You would become the king of Kahna. You don't want that, do you? But...[end]
Tee hee... I'm just kidding... It's still... too early for us... We should have brought Matelite too.[end]
Hey... [character][0x1]. When we're a little older... When I feel the same way... If I ask you to come to the Church of Memories, will you?[end]
I promise. I can't see into the future.[end1]
That's right... We can't see into the future... Will we be far away from each other I wonder... Right now... [character][0x1]... Even if it's a lie... Promise me...[end]
Okay... A promise just between the two of us... Let's keep this a secret from Matelite and my father.[end]
Hurry, please go. I envy you...[end]
It's an order from [character][0x1] so I can't disobey. But it's really wars non t![end][end]
